Name: Colors’ Heartbeat
About the game: Please notice this game doesn't have English version now. Choose a command and defeat the enemy. New skills are acquired as the story progresses. The party consists of 6 people, and each time they act, they are replaced with a member who is on standby. Make the right choices and reach the ending. The era humans, dolls, and bioroids jointly create a society. What happened in this era?
